actions.name: Libero

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Physical or Special-Category Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Physical or Special-Category Attack.

Effect: Before applying damage, the user's Type changes to a Type that resists the incoming attack, then reduces the damage by a further 50%. The user remains as the transformed type for 5 Activations, or until switched out or @Affliction[fainted]. Libero can only be used once per combat.
